name: ROBO-COASTER
description:
Stay on track in your Death-Bot 2015 - kill spiders, get a high score, and watch out for the UFO (once you've killed that you've probably seen everything – there's no end to the game).

Music from Kevin MacLeod's excellent collection - http://incompetech.com/

Made for Train Jam 2015. Thanks go out to all of my fellow jammers and the Amtrak train crew, it was an awesome trip and I'd love to do it again next year

Extra special thanks to Adriel Wallick for organising the event!

Controls:

  • You need a mouse or trackpad to play, plus WASD or the arrow keys
  • Alter the mouse sensitivity as appropriate on the title screen with left/right arrow keys or AD
  • Mouse to look around, left mouse (or spacebar) to shoot, tap up/down to toggle your speed or reverse your direction on the track (you can't stop), tap left/right to switch to another track when it's alongside
  • Esc to quit

Best played full screen with the volume up on a downloaded version!
